DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective preliminary study investigate whether transcranial direct current stimulation ( tDCS ) improve cognitive function patient Mild Cognitive Impairment ( MCI )
DOC.brief_title: A Pilot Study tDCS Mild Cognitive Impairment
DOC.detailed_description: Twenty patient recruit randomized receive either real sham-tDCS left ( anode ) right ( cathode ) dorsolateral prefrontal cortex ( DLPFC ) . Patients legally responsible caregiver provide mobile tDCS device , instruct use home . 30-minute session stimulation apply everyday morning 12 week . The patient evaluate baseline , week 6 12 .
